common_errors.pattern: no config found|configuration not found|search returned null
causes: No config file in searched locations
solutions: Create config file: .{name}rc, {name}.config.js, or package.json key
Verify searchPlaces includes your file format
Check module name matches config file name
Use explorer.search() from correct directory

causes: Invalid JSON/YAML/JS syntax in config file
solutions: Validate config file syntax (JSON/YAML lint)
Check file extension matches expected format
Use appropriate loader in cosmiconfig options
Save config file in UTF-8 encoding

causes: ESM config file in CommonJS project
solutions: Use cosmiconfig v8+ for ESM support
Add type: 'module' to package.json for .js ESM
Use .cjs extension for CommonJS config
Use .mjs extension for ESM config

causes: Config file changed but cache not cleared
Multiple explorer instances with different caches
solutions: Use explorer.clearCaches() to reset cache
Create new explorer for fresh search
Disable cache: { cache: false } in options
Use load() with clearCaches() in development
Check transform function returns { config, filepath }
Handle errors in transform function
Use async transform with cosmiconfigSync for async loaders
Validate transform input before processing
Install cosmiconfig-typescript-loader
Add .ts to searchPlaces and configure loader
Install ts-node and typescript as devDependencies
Use transpiled .js config instead
